channel.title: Latin American perspectives
channel.description:
A series of comment and analysis about current affairs in Latin American countries.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Spanish Peru, 1532-1560
item.description: This program focuses on "Spanish Peru, 1532-1560" by James Lockhart.
item.dc:creator: Southern Illinois University at Carbondale
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.title: United States Navy
item.description: This program focuses on the United States Navy and its role in certain independence movements in South America.
item.dc:creator: Gardiner, C. Harvey (Clinton Harvey)
item.dc:subject: NAEB Regions III & IV: The Upper Midwest

item.title: Roberto de Oliveira Campos
item.description: The program focuses on the writings of Roberto de Oliveira Campos.
